original_text:
Bee Hive Bonanza
La software house NetEnt, tra le più produttive degli ultimi anni, ha creato slot machine dedicate praticamente a qualsiasi tema. Con Bee Hive siamo immersi nella natura, grazie a un gioco dedicato alle api. La simpatia di questo insetto, che troviamo qua in versione cartone animato, rende l’esperienza ludica molto piacevole e divertente, inoltre la grafica di altissimo livello, come sempre in casa NetEnt, fa si che sia anche molto immersiva!
In Bee Hive Bonanza il tema delle api è fuso con quello del Medioevo, tanto che le troviamo vestite da sovrano o da giullare, la griglia si trova all’interno di un castello e i simboli sembrano effigi cavalleresche.
Caratteristiche di Bee Hive Bonanza
La griglia ha forma quadrata con 5 rulli e 5 righe e per vincere è necessario creare delle combo di almeno 6 simboli. Il sistema di gioco è a cascata, ciò vuol dire che ogni volta che otteniamo una combinazione vincente, i simboli paganti scompaiono e vengono sostituiti da altri.
La scommessa minima è pari a 0,10 €, la massima di 3 €. Tra le funzioni più interessanti troviamo l’Autoplay e la funzione turbo che ci permette di accelerare la rotazione dei rulli.
Uno sciame di Bonus!
I simboli di Bee Hive Bonanza sono suddivisibili in quelli dal valore basso e quelli con un valore alto. Contando la scommessa minima, i primi pagano tra i 0,03 € per una combo di 6-7 simboli fino a un massimo di 0,60 € per una combinazione di 22-24.
Con i simboli di alto valore invece si può arrivare a guadagnare sino a 0,80 € con combinazioni estese.
La funzione Money Bee si attiva quando sui rulli compaiono i simboli Bee associati a un moltiplicatore x1, x2, x5 o x10.
I simboli Bee possono comparire associati ama altri simboli speciali e attivare diverse funzioni. Eccole nel dettaglio:

Bee Hive: vengono sommati i valori di tutte le api che compaiono sui rulli.
Multiplier Bee Hive: moltiplica per 2 tutti i valori dei simboli Bee.
Adder Bee Hive: aumenta i valori di tutti i simboli Bee

La coppa di miele è il nostro simbolo Scatter: 3, 4 o 5 attivano rispettivamente 10, 15 e 20 Free Spins. Ogni Scatter aggiuntivo che compare durante il giro Bonus viene raccolto in un misuratore alla sinistra della griglia. Ogni tot di Scatter raccolti corrisponde un moltiplicatore compreso tra x2 e x5. Questa funzione speciale può anche essere acquistata.

FAQ: Le risposte alle domande più frequenti 
Con il sistema a cascata le possibilità di vincere aumentano?

Sì, perché c’è la possibilità di creare nuove potenziali combinazioni. Alcuni giochi con questo sistema offrono un solo Respin, non è il caso di Bee Hive Bonanza che continua a sostituire simboli sino. a quando si creano combo vincenti



Posso giocare solo sul computer?

No, Bee Hive Bonanza offre la possibilità di giocare con qualsiasi dispositivo, smartphone o tablet, senza perdere in fluidità!



Dove posso trovare Bee Hive Bonanza?

In tutti i casinò principali dotati di certificazione AAMS, gli unici riconosciuti dallo Stato italiano.

raw_translation.response:
Bee Hive Bonanza

NetEnt, one of the most prolific software houses in recent years, has created slot machines dedicated to almost any theme. With Bee Hive, we are immersed in nature, thanks to a game dedicated to bees. The loveable cartoon version of these insects makes for a very enjoyable and entertaining game. Additionally, the high-quality graphics, as always with NetEnt, make the experience even more immersive!

In Bee Hive Bonanza, the theme of bees is fused with that of the Middle Ages. Bees are dressed as kings or jesters, the grid is located within a castle, and the symbols look like knightly effigies.

Features of Bee Hive Bonanza

The grid is square in shape with 5 reels and 5 rows, and to win, you need to create combos of at least 6 symbols. The game system is cascade, which means that every time we get a winning combination, the paying symbols disappear and are replaced by others.

The minimum bet is 0.10 €, the maximum is 3 €. Among the most interesting functions we find Autoplay and the turbo function, which allows us to speed up the rotation of the reels.

A swarm of Bonuses!

The symbols in Bee Hive Bonanza can be divided into those with low value and those with high value. Counting the minimum bet, the former pay between 0.03 € for a combination of 6-7 symbols and up to a maximum of 0.60 € for a combination of 22-24.

With the high-value symbols, on the other hand, you can earn up to 0.80 € with extended combinations. 

The Money Bee feature is activated when the Bee symbols associated with a 1x, 2x, 5x, or 10x multiplier appear on the reels.

The Bee symbols can appear associated with other special symbols and activate different functions. Here they are in detail:

Bee Hive: the values of all the bees appearing on the reels are added.

Multiplier Bee Hive: doubles all the values of the Bee symbols.

Adder Bee Hive: increases the values of all the Bee symbols.

The honey cup is our Scatter symbol: with 3, 4, or 5, you can respectively activate 10, 15, and 20 Free Spins. Each additional Scatter that appears during the Bonus round is collected in a meter to the left of the grid. Every few Scatter collected corresponds to a multiplier ranging from x2 to x5. This special function can also be purchased.

FAQ: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

Do the cascade system increases your chances of winning?

Yes, because there is the possibility of creating new potential combinations. Some games with this system only offer one Respin, but this is not the case with Bee Hive Bonanza, which continues to replace symbols until winning combos are created.

Can I only play on a computer?

No, Bee Hive Bonanza offers the possibility to play with any device, smartphone or tablet, without losing in fluidity!

Where can I find Bee Hive Bonanza?

In all the major casinos certified by AAMS, the only ones recognized by the Italian State.

Below is a review of the game "Bee Hive Bonanza".

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a length of 15 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics and features

Bee Hive Bonanza has 5 reels and 5 rows in a square-shaped grid, and to win, you need to create combos of at least 6 symbols. The game system is cascade, which means that every time we get a winning combination, the paying symbols disappear and are replaced by others. The minimum bet is 0.10 €, the maximum is 3 €. Among the most interesting functions we find Autoplay and the turbo function, which allows us to speed up the rotation of the reels.

Theme and design

Bee Hive Bonanza's theme is bees fused with that of the Middle Ages. Bees are dressed as kings or jesters, and the grid is located within a castle. The symbols look like knightly effigies these plus the loveable cartoon version of these insects make for a fun and endearing game. The high-quality graphics immerse players even further.

Bonus symbols

The Bee symbols can appear associated with other special symbols and activate different functions. The Money Bee feature is activated when the Bee symbols associated with a 1x, 2x, 5x, or 10x multiplier appear on the reels. Bee Hive: the values of all the bees appearing on the reels are added. Multiplier Bee Hive: doubles all the values of the Bee symbols. Adder Bee Hive: increases the values of all the Bee symbols.

Scatter symbol

The honey cup is the Scatter symbol in Bee Hive Bonanza. With 3, 4, or 5, you can respectively activate 10, 15, and 20 Free Spins. Each additional Scatter that appears during the Bonus round is collected to a meter to the left of the grid. Every few Scatter collected corresponds to a multiplier ranging from x2 to x5. This special function can also be purchased.

Free spins

You can activate Free Spins in Bee Hive Bonanza by landing 3, 4, or 5 Scatter symbols. The number of Free Spins you receive depends on how many Scatters you landed. Each additional Scatter that appears during the Bonus round adds to a meter to the left of the grid. Every few Scatter collected corresponds to a multiplier ranging from x2 to x5. This special function can also be purchased.

With the high-value symbols, on the other hand, you can earn up to 0.80 € with extended combinations. 

The Money Bee feature is activated when the Bee symbols associated with a 1x, 2x, 5x, or 10x multiplier appear on the reels.
